scripts.start: export ENV=localhost && yarn cypress-env && cypress open -C cypress.localhost.json
scripts.start:LOCAL: export ENV=LOCAL && yarn cypress-env && cypress open --config-file=cypress.LOCAL.config.ts
scripts.start:DEV: export ENV=DEV && yarn cypress-env && cypress open --config-file=cypress.DEV.config.ts
scripts.test:LOCAL: export ENV=LOCAL && yarn cypress-env && yarn test
scripts.test:account:LOCAL: export ENV=LOCAL && yarn cypress-env && yarn test:account
scripts.test:category:LOCAL: export ENV=LOCAL && yarn cypress-env && yarn test:category
scripts.test:project:LOCAL: export ENV=LOCAL && yarn cypress-env && yarn test:category
scripts.test:product:LOCAL: export ENV=LOCAL && yarn cypress-env && yarn test:product
scripts.test:recipient:LOCAL: export ENV=LOCAL && yarn cypress-env && yarn test:recipient
scripts.test:transaction-common:LOCAL: export ENV=LOCAL && yarn cypress-env && yarn test:transaction-common
scripts.test:transaction-deferred:LOCAL: export ENV=LOCAL && yarn cypress-env && yarn test:transaction-deferred
scripts.test:transaction-payment:LOCAL: export ENV=LOCAL && yarn cypress-env && yarn test:transaction-payment
scripts.test:transaction-split:LOCAL: export ENV=LOCAL && yarn cypress-env && yarn test:transaction-split
scripts.test:transaction-reimbursement:LOCAL: export ENV=LOCAL && yarn cypress-env && yarn test:transaction-reimbursement
scripts.test:transaction-transfer:LOCAL: export ENV=LOCAL && yarn cypress-env && yarn test:transaction-transfer
